item.title: Help with Restricting use of a object
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

   [code]case 9319: //Slayer Tower, Spikey Chain
	if (objectX == 3422 && objectY == 3550)  {
                if (playerHasItemAmount(4162, 3) //Leaf-bladed Spear
                && playerHasItemAmount(4162, 3) //Rock Hammer
                && playerHasItemAmount(6708, 4) //Slayer Gloves
                && playerHasItemAmount(7053, 5) //Lit Bug Lantern
                && playerHasItemAmount(4156, 6) || playerLevel[18] >= 50) { //Mirror Sheild
            deleteItem(4162, GetItemSlot(4162), 3);
            deleteItem(6708, GetItemSlot(6708), 4);
            deleteItem(7056, GetItemSlot(7056), 5);
            deleteItem(4156, GetItemSlot(4156), 6);
            sendMessage("You climb the ladder.");
            heightLevel += 1;
            teleportToX = absX;
            teleportToY = absY;
          }
        } else {
            sendMessage("The Guard is not pleased with your offering");
            sendMessage("Type ::slayerhelp");
        }
	if (objectX == xxxx && objectY == xxxx) {
                if (playerHasItemAmount(xxxx, 3) //Leaf-bladed Spear
                && playerHasItemAmount(xxxx, 3) //Rock Hammer
                && playerHasItemAmount(xxxx, 4) //Slayer Gloves
                && playerHasItemAmount(xxxx, 5) //Lit Bug Lantern
                && playerHasItemAmount(xxxx, 6) || playerLevel[18] >= 50) { //Mirror Sheild
            deleteItem(4162, GetItemSlot(4162), 3);
            deleteItem(6708, GetItemSlot(6708), 4);
            deleteItem(7056, GetItemSlot(7056), 5);
            deleteItem(4156, GetItemSlot(4156), 6);
            sendMessage("You climb the ladder.");
            heightLevel += 1;
            teleportToX = absX;
            teleportToY = absY;
          }
        } else {
            sendMessage("The Guard is not pleased with your offering");
            sendMessage("Type ::slayerhelp");
        }
        break;[/code]

Try that, i think it wasn’t working because you cant have “if object, playerhasitem, playerskill” all in the same thing. So i separated the object part as a second if statement.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Restricting use of a object

item.title: Help with Restricting use of a object
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

ok i am having more trouble Restricting the use of a object

This is the error i am getting

client.java:2783: illegal start of expression && playerHasItemAmount(4162, 3) //Leaf-bladed Spear ^ client.java:2787: not a statement && playerHasItemAmount(4156, 6) || playerLevel[18] >= 50) { //Mirror Sheild ^ client.java:2787: ';' expected && playerHasItemAmount(4156, 6) || playerLevel[18] >= 50) { //Mirror Sheild ^ client.java:2796: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ 4 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

This is my code

case 9319: //Slayer Tower, Spikey Chain if ((playerHasItemAmount(4158, 2) == true) //Leaf-bladed Spear && (playerHasItemAmount(4162, 3) == true) //Rock Hammer && (playerHasItemAmount(6708, 4) == true) //Slayer Gloves && (playerHasItemAmount(7053, 5) == true) //Lit Bug Lantern && (playerHasItemAmount(4156, 6) == true || (playerLevel[18] <= 50)) { //Mirror Sheild deleteItem(4162, GetItemSlot(4162), 3); deleteItem(6708, GetItemSlot(6708), 4); deleteItem(7056, GetItemSlot(7056), 5); deleteItem(4156, GetItemSlot(4156), 6); sendMessage("The guard is pleased with your offering"); sendMessage("You Climb the chain."); heightLevel += 1; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(4158, 2) == false) //Leaf-bladed Spear && (playerHasItemAmount(4162, 3) == false) //Rock Hammer && (playerHasItemAmount(6708, 4) == false) //Slayer Gloves && (playerHasItemAmount(7053, 5) == false) //Lit Bug Lantern && (playerHasItemAmount(4156, 6) == false)) { sendMessage("The Guard is not plesed with your offering"); sendMessage("Type ::slayerhelp"); } break;
and this is ultimately what i want to have

case 9319: //Slayer Tower, Spikey Chain if (objectX == 3422 && objectY == 3550) && playerHasItemAmount(4162, 3) //Leaf-bladed Spear && playerHasItemAmount(4162, 3) //Rock Hammer && playerHasItemAmount(6708, 4) //Slayer Gloves && playerHasItemAmount(7053, 5) //Lit Bug Lantern && playerHasItemAmount(4156, 6) || playerLevel[18] >= 50) { //Mirror Sheild deleteItem(4162, GetItemSlot(4162), 3); deleteItem(6708, GetItemSlot(6708), 4); deleteItem(7056, GetItemSlot(7056), 5); deleteItem(4156, GetItemSlot(4156), 6); sendMessage("You climb the ladder."); heightLevel += 1; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else { sendMessage("The Guard is not pleased with your offering"); sendMessage("Type ::slayerhelp"); } if (objectX == xxxx && objectY == xxxx) && playerHasItemAmount(xxxx, 3) //Leaf-bladed Spear && playerHasItemAmount(xxxx, 3) //Rock Hammer && playerHasItemAmount(xxxx, 4) //Slayer Gloves && playerHasItemAmount(xxxx, 5) //Lit Bug Lantern && playerHasItemAmount(xxxx, 6) || playerLevel[18] >= 50) { //Mirror Sheild deleteItem(4162, GetItemSlot(4162), 3); deleteItem(6708, GetItemSlot(6708), 4); deleteItem(7056, GetItemSlot(7056), 5); deleteItem(4156, GetItemSlot(4156), 6); sendMessage("You climb the ladder."); heightLevel += 1; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else { sendMessage("The Guard is not pleased with your offering"); sendMessage("Type ::slayerhelp"); } break

If i need to explain more i will!
if i cant get help i will just use 2 different object

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Restricting use of a object
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:8, topic:259839”] case 9319: //Slayer Tower, Spikey Chain if (playerHasItemAmount(4158, 2) //Leaf-bladed Spear && playerHasItemAmount(4162, 3) //Rock Hammer && playerHasItemAmount(6708, 4) //Slayer Gloves && playerHasItemAmount(7053, 5) //Lit Bug Lantern && playerHasItemAmount(4156, 6) || playerLevel[18] >= 50) { //Mirror Sheild deleteItem(4162, GetItemSlot(4162), 3); deleteItem(6708, GetItemSlot(6708), 4); deleteItem(7056, GetItemSlot(7056), 5); deleteItem(4156, GetItemSlot(4156), 6); sendMessage("The guard is pleased with your offering"); sendMessage("Hit the chest for slayer exp!"); heightLevel += 1; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else { sendMessage("The Guard is not plesed with your offering"); sendMessage("Type ::slayerhelp"); } break;
Try that.[/quote]That should work. I just looked at it, and he was putting to many parentheses in there. He was grouping things that should be separate =P

item.title: Help with Restricting use of a object
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

playerLevel[18] <= 50
You've used the wrong operator. You need to use the greater than or equal to operator. [code] playerLevel[18] >= 50 [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Restricting use of a object
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

ok i tried this and it didnt work

case 9319: //Slayer Tower, Spikey Chain if ((playerHasItemAmount(4158, 2) == true) //Leaf-bladed Spear && (playerHasItemAmount(4162, 3) == true) //Rock Hammer && (playerHasItemAmount(6708, 4) == true) //Slayer Gloves && (playerHasItemAmount(7053, 5) == true) //Lit Bug Lantern && (playerHasItemAmount(4156, 6) == true || (playerLevel[18] <= 50))) { //Mirror Sheild deleteItem(4162, GetItemSlot(4162), 3); deleteItem(6708, GetItemSlot(6708), 4); deleteItem(7056, GetItemSlot(7056), 5); deleteItem(4156, GetItemSlot(4156), 6); sendMessage("The guard is pleased with your offering"); sendMessage("Hit the chest for slayer exp!"); heightLevel += 1; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(4158, 2) == false) //Leaf-bladed Spear && (playerHasItemAmount(4162, 3) == false) //Rock Hammer && (playerHasItemAmount(6708, 4) == false) //Slayer Gloves && (playerHasItemAmount(7053, 5) == false) //Lit Bug Lantern && (playerHasItemAmount(4156, 6) == false)) { sendMessage("The Guard is not plesed with your offering"); sendMessage("Type ::slayerhelp"); } break;

Could anyone give me a hint on how to make it to were If the person has lv50+ slayer they can use the ladder and it send a certain message and if the player has certain items (s)he could also use the ladder and it send a different message

Any help what so ever is greatly appreciated

item.title: Help with Restricting use of a object
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

I’m not going to tell you right away what to do, because it looks like you actually know what you’re doing. So i’ll give you a hint.

you can use || for or in an if statment. example:

if (playerRights == 3 || playerRights == 2) {
sendMessage(“hey”);
}

sends the message if you’re rights are 3 or 2.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Restricting use of a object

item.title: Help with Restricting use of a object
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I know how to restrict the use of an object by the player having or wielding certain items but i just made this code for slayer tower and i was wondering i guess how i would say or in code

case 9319: //Slayer Tower, Spikey Chain if ((playerHasItemAmount(4158, 2) == true) //Leaf-bladed Spear && (playerHasItemAmount(4162, 3) == true) //Rock Hammer && (playerHasItemAmount(6708, 4) == true) //Slayer Gloves && (playerHasItemAmount(7053, 5) == true) //Lit Bug Lantern && (playerHasItemAmount(4156, 6) == true)) { //Mirror Sheild deleteItem(2363, GetItemSlot(4162), 3); deleteItem(2363, GetItemSlot(6708), 4); deleteItem(2363, GetItemSlot(7056), 5); deleteItem(2363, GetItemSlot(4156), 6); sendMessage("The guard is pleased with your offering"); sendMessage("Hit the chest for slayer exp!"); heightLevel += 1; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(4158, 2) == false) //Leaf-bladed Spear && (playerHasItemAmount(4162, 3) == false) //Rock Hammer && (playerHasItemAmount(6708, 4) == false) //Slayer Gloves && (playerHasItemAmount(7053, 5) == false) //Lit Bug Lantern && (playerHasItemAmount(4156, 6) == false)) { sendMessage("The Guard is not plesed with your offering"); sendMessage("Type ::slayerhelp"); } break;
That is what i have to far but i want it to be restricted by if you have the items or you slayer level is 50+
So if you dont have the items but you meet the level require meant you can use the chain and if you dont meet the level requirement but have the items you can use the chain

Anyone have any help?

Read full topic
